entry.source: {F812}Chaste voice\0{F813,0,264001}...I suspected that we would meet.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,264002}My former brother, blinded and consumed{F801}by pride, and the pitiful son of man{F801}who sold his soul to the demons.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Chaste voice\0{F813,0,264001}...I suspected that we would meet.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,264002}My former brother, blinded and consumed{F801}by pride, and the pitiful son of man{F801}who sold his soul to the demons.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Merkabah\0{F813,0,264003}{F87A,205}I am the Lord's chariot... the seraph{F801}Merkabah.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Merkabah\0{F813,0,264003}{F87A,205}I am the Lord's chariot... the seraph{F801}Merkabah.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,264004}You Unclean Ones, who mistakenly{F801}believe that chaos is an expression{F801}of free will...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,264004}You Unclean Ones, who mistakenly{F801}believe that chaos is an expression{F801}of free will...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,264005}Let us see Armageddon through to the{F801}end, for a new millennium of order.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,264005}Let us see Armageddon through to the{F801}end, for a new millennium of order.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}{F813,0,264006}No matter how loyal one is to God,{F801}He will never answer.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,264007}That is all. What else need there be?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}{F813,0,264006}No matter how loyal one is to God,{F801}He will never answer.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,264007}That is all. What else need there be?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}{F813,0,264009}We have dispelled God's curse.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,264010}From now on, this world will be{F801}governed by the law of power.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}{F813,0,264009}We have dispelled God's curse.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,264010}From now on, this world will be{F801}governed by the law of power.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,-1085}{F813,1,401214}We have dispelled even God's curse...{F801}{F802}There are none left in the world who{F801}could stop us. So we have no need of{F801}the Demon Lord's power anymore.{F801}{F802}Now, to the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,-1085}{F813,1,401214}We have dispelled even God's curse...{F801}{F802}There are none left in the world who{F801}could stop us. So we have no need of{F801}the Demon Lord's power anymore.{F801}{F802}Now, to the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The statue of Aquila was destroyed...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The statue of Aquila was destroyed...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Lucifer\0{F87A,-1085}That statue was modeled after a great{F801}hero of this kingdom. To only allow{F801}God to be worshipped by the people...{F801}{F802}That smacks of something that His{F801}puppets would do.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400004}We've come this far, so no need to{F801}take on any more quests.{F801}{F802}I'll set all the quests as ineligible{F801}to be accepted.{F801}
